item.title: Deletes admin/mod/owner cape wen u wear
item.dc:creator: @liltwixis11 liltwixis11
item.description:
@liltwixis11 wrote:

im trying to make it so you dont die when someone whos not admin/mod/owner wears the cape, the code to die is this

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 3781 && playerRights < 2) { ApplyDead(); teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("You Must be an Admin to wield this cape!");
im trying to make it so it justs deletes the cape when u wear it, is it this? cuz i tried and it doesnt work

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 3781 && playerRights < 2) { deleteItem(3781, getItemSlot(3781), 1); sendMessage("You Must be an Admin to wield this cape!");
if sum1 knows plz help[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 05:41:13 PM[/size][hr]any1?
